ygData.subject: RE: Finding Ores
ygData.msgSnippet: Can find ores and clays (blocks, small and large) on Muddites in Beholder. From what I ve seen, the Muddite Minors have clay alot of time (heavy...), and I
ygData.messageBody:
Can find ores and clays (blocks, small and large) on Muddites in Beholder.
From what I've seen, the Muddite Minors have clay alot of time (heavy...),
and I *think* the elders have ore on them at times. Don't smith so I never
paid attention, but that's what I've heard.

-----Original Message-----
From: Darrell Runyan [mailto:runyan@...]
Sent: Monday, July 26, 1999 4:31 PM
To: EQCheats
Subject: [EQCheats] Finding Ores


From: Darrell Runyan <runyan@...>

profits are still to be had in some respects in certain skills - you
just
have to be willing to do a little work ... like getting your own ores
and
clays, and not buying them from the store. That alone will save you a
lot
of money, not a lot of time, but a lot of money. :)

Would someone please tell me where to find ore besides buying it? I'm a
17th level ranger so finding it on a rare 30th level spawn in the bottom
of some dungeon is pretty useless. Nonetheless, where is it to be found
at all?

Leatherwood
